Usage: anyrepo update [OPTIONS]

  Create/update all dependent git clones.

Options:
  -P, --project TEXT   Project path to operate on only. All by default. This
                       option can be specified multiple times.
  -M, --manifest FILE  Manifest file. 'anyrepo.toml' by default.
  --rebase             Run 'git rebase' instead of 'git pull'
  --prune              Remove obsolete git clones
  --help               Show this message and exit.
